title: S4 Ep1: The refugee's dilemma
itunes:title: The refugee's dilemma
description: A new study uses detailed data on the persecution of Jews in Nazi Germany to investigate why individuals become refugees. Mathias Thoenig tells Tim Phillips about a simple policy that would have saved hundreds of thousands of lives in the 1930s, but is still ignored today.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
